Team,

Every once I a while I'll see a message or archived message about a =
forum member processing hundreds of thousands or millions of URL seeds or D=
omain seeds.

Three questions: 1) How does one get that many seeds? 2) Are =
the seeds topical or specific to a keyword? 3) Are you using Heritrix or so=
me other tool?  

I have been relying on google SERPs for first 1000 result=
s and broad crawl for my projects.  The result has been less that desireabl=
e.

I think if I can expand the number of seeds, my results will be much be=
tter in terms of number items found during my crawl meeting my criteria.

T=
hanks in advance.

David
